meanings.sent1: The unripped paper was smooth and intact.
meanings.sent2: She wore an unripped dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The unripped book looked brand new, even though it was old.
meanings.sent4: His unripped jeans symbolized his careful nature.
meanings.sent5: The unripped flag fluttered proudly in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The unripped poster stayed securely on the wall.
meanings.sent2: He found an unripped envelope in the mailbox.
meanings.sent3: The unripped map led them safely to their destination.
meanings.sent4: Her unripped painting was admired by everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unripped banner remained unfurled in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Not having a rip or tear
meanings.sent1: The unripped fabric was perfect for sewing.
meanings.sent2: He proudly showed off his unripped comic book collection.
meanings.sent3: The unripped photograph captured a special moment.
meanings.sent4: Her unripped umbrella kept her dry in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The unripped document was carefully preserved in a folder.
